front: This word is the longest word in the English dictionary. It refers to a lung disease caused by inhaling particles from volcanoes.
The only word in the English language with three consecutive sets of double letters
Mel Blanc, voice artist speaking Bugs Bunny, was allergic to this.
This United States coin has 118 ridges around it.
The Emperor Caligula once decided to go to war with this Roman God of the sea and ordered his soldiers to throw their spears into the water at random
